ch0133_00_shilver_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
There you go again with that carefree look on
your face, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I wish
I had that luxury.
ch0133_00_shilver_salon/8201_2101_01_10: I don’t need this. You can have it.
ch0133_00_shilver_salon/8201_2101_02_10:
You’ve got a lot of free time. I’m sure you can
figure out how to use it.
ch0133_00_shilver_salon/8201_2102_01_10: I just found this. You can have it.
ch0133_00_shilver_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
Don’t look at me like that. I really did just
find it on my way here. If you don’t want it,
give it back.
ch0133_00_shilver_salon/8201_2103_01_10: Here, you can have this. Just take it.
ch0133_00_shilver_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
If you don’t keep getting stronger, battling you
won’t be worth my time.
ch0133_00_shilver_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Tell me what
you know.
ch0133_00_shilver_salon/8201_2203_01_10: I got some useful info. Wanna hear it?
ch0133_00_shilver_salon/8201_2302_01_10:
You’re giving this to me? You sure have
weird taste.
ch0133_00_shilver_salon/8201_2301_01_10:
So you do know a thing or two about what
I like, huh. Thanks.
ch0133_00_shilver_salon/8201_2301_02_10: Just so you know, don’t expect anything in return.
ch0133_00_shilver_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
Sorry for taking up your time. I’ll make up for
it later.
ch0133_00_shilver_salon/8001_0701_01_10: What? I’m not here to make friends, OK?
ch0133_00_shilver_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
I’m just here to get more intel from Trainers who
know what they’re doing. So don’t get the
wrong idea.
ch0133_00_shilver_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
You know...I never thought that Pokémon would
ever like me.
ch0133_00_shilver_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
At least...not until that professor from
New Bark Town told me so.
ch0133_00_shilver_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
I’ve come to terms with the fact that my Pokémon
consider me their friend.
ch0133_00_shilver_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
There’s other people on Pasio like me who like to
mind their own business.
ch0133_00_shilver_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
I thought about what would happen if we ever
ended up on the same team.
ch0133_00_shilver_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
Yeah... I don’t think anyone would want to
see that.
ch0133_00_shilver_salon/8003_0701_04_10:
It’s annoying, but being strong as an individual
just isn’t enough to keep winning here on Pasio.
